name: The Last Stand (itch) (Francesco Busnelli)
description:
This is my first game I've ever made by myself!

I hope that it's not so terrible considering that it's been only three months since I started learning how to use Unity. I will add more feature and fix the existing one in the future.

I hope you enjoy this game as I enjoyed learning to create a videogame.  :)

Let me know what you think and excuse me if my English it's not perfect, I'm Italian!
